titles.title: For Thou, O Lord, Art High Above The Earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For Thou, O Lord, art high above the earth.
Thou art exalted far above all gods.
For Thou, O Lord, art high above the earth.
Thou art exalted far above all gods.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We exalt Thee. We exalt Thee.
We exalt Thee, O Lord.
We exalt Thee. We exalt Thee.
We exalt Thee, O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I exalt Thee. I exalt Thee.
I exalt Thee, O Lord. (2x).

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Eres excelso Oh Dios, sobre la tierra.
Eres exaltado sobre todos los dioses. (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Te exalto. Te exalto.
Te exalto, Oh Dios. (2x)
